e="preserve">William David Davies, better known as Dai Davies (born 1 April 1948), is a former Welsh professional footballer. He played in goal between 1969 and 1987. He made 52 appearances for the Wales national football team, and played for Everton, Wrexham (twice), Tranmere Rovers and three spells at Swansea City.
Davies was born in Glanaman, Wales.
In August 2020, Davies was diagnosed with terminal pancreatic cancer.
